description: Columbine (Aquilegia 'Red Hobbit') is a stunning perennial plant with vibrant, red-tipped blooms. This hardy species blooms from May until the first frost, with the red flowers making a stunning contrast to the bright green leaves. The plants are drought and shade tolerant, making them an easy-to-care-for choice for any garden. They also require minimal care once established and will attract birds, bees, and butterflies with their sweet-smelling nectar. The bright red blooms of the 'Red Hobbit' are perfect for adding a pop of colour to any garden and make for a lively, romantic addition to any outdoor space.
